wmaethner commented on Issue #236

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Michael Donnelly moved the following disposition, seconded by Anthony Julian

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will update all element references to use the monospaced format.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
